TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalValueEntry extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示屬性識別項和本機設定相依性屬性的屬性值。

span.span: Represents a property identifier and the property value for a locally set dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得的值時，會傳回這個類別的執行個體屬性。Instances of this class are returned when getting the value of the property of a . 所有屬性是唯讀。All properties are read-only. 這個類別會有任何公用建構函式。This class has no public constructor. 若要取得您必須先呼叫這個類別的執行個體，然後取得的值從傳回。In order to obtain instances of this class you must call , and then get the value of from the returned . ## Examples 下列範例會逐一查看在本機設定值和查詢屬性。The following example iterates locally set values of a and queries properties. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

summary.span: 判斷兩個 執行個體是否相等。

span.span: Determines whether two instances are equal.

returns.span: 此 實作會比較 的值，而且也可能比較 的值。

span.span: This implementation compares the values of the , and potentially compares the values of .

returns.span: 的 元件為值型別，因此永遠都是位元 (Bitwise) 比較。

span.span: The component of a is a value type, so will always be a bitwise comparison.

returns.span: 如果 元件是值型別，這個實作會運用位元比較。

span.span: For the component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.

returns.span: 針對擁有參考型別的本機設定屬性，行為會受到此型別相等判斷機制的延後，因為它只會在兩個數值上內部使用 == 運算子。

span.span: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it just uses the == operator on the two values internally.

returns.span: 根據預設，這會是值的參考相等，所以整個 的相等將會變成參考相等。

span.span: By default, this would be a reference equality of the values and thus the equality of the entire would become a reference equality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 實作會比較 的值，而且也可能比較 的值。This implementation compares the values of the , and potentially compares the values of . 元件一律是實值類型，因此這項比較會永遠都是位元的值比較。The component of a is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise value comparison. 如果 元件是值型別，這個實作會運用位元比較。For the component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type. 針對擁有參考型別的本機設定屬性，行為會受到此型別相等判斷機制的延後，因為它只會在兩個數值上內部使用 `==` 運算子。For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the `==` operator on the two values internally. 根據預設，這是值的參考相等。By default, this is a reference equality of the values.

summary.span: 取得以這個項目表示之本機設定相依性屬性的識別項。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the locally set dependency property that is represented by this entry.

value.span: 本機設定之相依性屬性的識別項。

span.span: The identifier for the locally set dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性用於查詢的識別項的本機設定相依性屬性，並取得它的中繼資料。Use this property to query the identifier of the locally set dependency property and to obtain its metadata. 此取得中繼資料可能包含屬性的屬性是否支援屬性值繼承的初始預設值。This obtained metadata may include the initial default value of the property and whether the property supports property value inheritance.
